item.title: Diagnostics in .Net Core 3: Using dotnet-counters with Docker
item.description: In my previous post, I described how we can leverage the new EventCounter diagnostics API to add custom event counters and listen for built in counters. In this article, I will walk through how we can leverage the dotnet-counters tool with a running docker image.

item.title: Diagnostics in .Net Core 3: Event Counters
item.description: Recently, I’ve been playing with the new diagnostic improvements in .Net Core 3. Traditionally, I’ve always used the great AppMetrics package to capture the metrics from our applications and send scrape them with a Prometheus & Grafana setup. Whilst reading about the improvements, I wondered whether or not it would be possible to push metrics to Prometheus.
